summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and several individuals from a financial institution. The email outlines the participants and the purpose of the meeting, indicating Epstein's involvement in asset and wealth management discussions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the main subject of the email, seeking to meet with various individuals for discussions related to asset and wealth management.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Morris is coordinating the meeting and mentions other individuals who will be involved in discussions with Epstein.

persons.name: Caroline Kididis
persons.role: Head of Key Clients Partners Group
persons.context: Kididis is mentioned as one of the attendees for the meeting with Epstein.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.role: Director of Key Clients Partners Group
persons.context: Smith is also mentioned as an attendee for the meeting with Epstein.

persons.name: Vinit Sahni
persons.context: Sahni is referenced as someone who will meet with Epstein in the coming weeks, having recently transitioned to asset and wealth management.

connections.description: Morris is organizing meetings for Epstein with various financial professionals.
Morris is coordinating a meeting that includes Kididis, who works under him.
Morris is coordinating a meeting that includes Smith, who works under him.
Sahni is mentioned as someone who will meet with Epstein in the future.

events.title: Meeting with Paul Morris and Associates
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Epstein to meet with Paul Morris, Caroline Kididis, and Tazia Smith.

keyFacts: The email discusses a meeting scheduled for September 6, 2013, involving Jeffrey Epstein and several financial professionals.
Paul Morris is coordinating the meeting and mentions other individuals who will be involved.
Vinit Sahni is noted as someone who will meet with Epstein in the coming weeks.
